author: nc1234
content:
I compared the EIP7805 beacon states between Lodestar and Prysm:
```
98982c98982
< deposit_requests_start_index: '18446744073709551615'
---
> deposit_requests_start_index: '0'
```
Looks like Prysm set this field to `UNSET_DEPOSIT_REQUESTS_START_INDEX` again when upgrading state to eip7805. I notice Prysm's states in Electra have correct value of 0 for `deposit_requests_start_index`

author: nc1234
content: I don't see any state diff other than this. There is a good chance Lodestar and Prysm will agree on the same state when this issue is fixed

author: jih2nn
content:
Thanks for pointing it out! I've modified it and re-ran it. It works for a few slots and then starts to go wrong.

I've updated the PR with your comment addressed. Would you want to try it out?
